title: GAME KEEPS CRASHING
body: My game keeps crashing at the screen after champ select when it loads everyone in. Its always bug splat. how can i fix this? i haven't been able to play a game since. Patch 6.18

replies.body:
Bug splats are usually an indication that there's a problem with your system drivers or hardware. Our [Bugsplat & Crash guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) consolidates the most common solutions for this issue, so I strongly suggest working through that guide.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
